lead_paragraph: The Premier League will offer a tougher challenge to Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola despite his success in the La Liga and Bundesliga, Liverpool boss Juergen Klopp said.

headline.print_headline: Man City Boss Guardiola Faces Biggest Challenge in England-Klopp
headline.main: Man City Boss Guardiola Faces Biggest Challenge in England-Klopp

snippet: The Premier League will offer a tougher challenge to Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola despite his success in the La Liga and Bundesliga, Liverpool boss Juergen Klopp said....
